channel.title: Court Wizard Buff ideas
channel.description:
The Court Wizard is very boring to play as. His main ability rarely does anything and it's almost impossible to have a meaningful impact on the game.
I suggest that the Magic Barrier should work until the next night. Meaning it is still active during the day. I also would say that you should be notified if you actually block anything with Ice ward/Magic Barrier

item.title: Court Wizard Buff ideas
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
That’s a nerf. We are trying to buff the CW right now

Read full topic

item.title: Court Wizard Buff ideas

item.description:
welp, make it that it only block one ability.

Read full topic

item.title: Court Wizard Buff ideas
item.dc:creator: RopeStringFace
item.description:
I agree with you being notified of blocking something;

without it, even if you did something meaningful, you fell useless.

Read full topic
